device-error.title: Device Error
device-error.message: Some devices have errors. Recording will stop.

session-completed.title: Session Completed
session-completed.message: The session has completed. Recording will stop. Which state do you want to update?

stop-recording.title: Stop Recording
stop-recording.message: The recording will be stopped. Which state do you want to update?

status-changed.title: Status Changed
status-changed.message: The status has been changed. The page will be redirected.

messages.stop-success: The recording has been saved successfully!
messages.sync-success: The recording has been synced successfully!
